Champions League
Naples - Salzburg: Erling Haaland, stronger than Mbapp√©!
Salzburg player Erlin Haaland set a new record after scoring a goal against Naples yesterday in the Champions League (1-1)
06 Nov 2019, 11:41 by Hugo Deloraine



1. Real Madrid (146,000) While some teams are not fully qualified, others already have their place for the upcoming European campaign. Discover the UEFA coefficient of qualified teams (or almost) .Icon Sport

PSG, Lille, OL: all the coefficients of the teams qualified for the C1




Erling Haaland continues to madden the counters. The young Norwegian player (19 years) is also the top scorer in the Champions League at the moment. Yesterday, he scored his seventh goal in the competition this year, after his hat-trick against Genk, his goal against Liverpool and his double against Napoli in the match. to go. He establishes, a new record, that even Kylian Mbapp√© does not have!




7 goals in 4 games!




Haaland remains "zen" +33 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Indeed, the Norwegian player became yesterday the youngest player scored in his first four appearances in the Champions League. In addition, he broke the record for the player who scored the most goals in his first four group matches, ahead of players such as Henry, Drogba or Diego Costa. If he continues like this, he should not stay long on the side of Salzburg.
